Text: Is this the paid version or the free one that I already have?
So how does posting a link to their marketplace page answer if this is the free or paid version?
While I always appreciate the work of uploaders, i don't understand why anyone posts free apps. It's a lot easier to simply get them from the market.

This is the free version....but you can easily remove ads with
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.adaway
Yeah, but not everyone is rooted. Again, appreciate the effort, but please don't waste everyone's time.
